thread.title: Ground News - With war raging in Gaza, Christmas is effectively cancelled in Bethlehem
thread.title_full: Ground News - With war raging in Gaza, Christmas is effectively cancelled in Bethlehem

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - With war raging in Gaza, Christmas is effectively cancelled in Bethlehem
text:
Summary by Ground News Beth Bethlehem, the birthplace of Jesus Christ, is almost deserted this Christmas. Local leaders made the decision last month to scale back festivities in solidarity with the Palestinian population. More than 20,000 Palestinians have been killed during Israel's air and ground offensive in Gaza . The war was sparked by Hamas terror attack on October 7 on southern Israel. Share menu More
Filters 7 Articles 7 Articles All Left Center Right
CNN Lean Left High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Warner Bros. Discovery With war raging in Gaza, Christmas is effectively cancelled in Bethlehem Church bells echo through the labyrinth-like streets of Bethlehem. With Christmas approaching, the city in the Israeli-occupied West Bank should be teeming with visitors. But this year, it is almost deserted.
